WHO推荐的流感疫苗菌株的最新信息（2025-2026北半球）为了维持疫苗功效，他们定期根据全球流行病学，病毒学和血清学分析更新流感疫苗菌株。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/updates-on-influenza-vaccine-strain-recmorned-who-who-（2025-2025-2026-2026-Northern-Northern-horthern-Horthern-Hemisphere).aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/updates-on-influenza-vaccine-strain-strain-recommend-by-who-who-（2025-2025-2026-NORTERNENN-NORTHERNERNERN-HORTORNERN-HORTORNERN-HORTORNERN-HERTORNERN-HEMISPHERE） https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=55558DD20-C9A9-4C84-884-882A-FD267323ECD9 Wed, 12 Mar 2025 08:03:00 -0400 Updates on influenza vaccine strain recommended by WHO (2025-2026 northern hemisphere)
吉利德（Gilead）的Capsid Revolution符合我们的Capsid解决方案：中国生物学 - 工程工具以超越艾滋病毒吉利德科学（Gilead Sciences）宣布了一个重大的里程碑：美国FDA接受了其新药应用（NDAS），用于Lenacapavir（Len），这是一种每年两次可注射的HIV-1可注射HIV-1 CAPSID抑制剂，用于预防前预防（PREP）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/gileade28099s-capsid-revolution-revolution-meets-recid-meets-our-capsid-soliness-sino-biological-e28093- weendineering the-the-the-the-the-the-tools-tools-tools-to-to-outsmart-hiv.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/gileade28099s-capsid-revolution-revolution-meets-our-capsid-solutions-sino-biological-e28093- weendineering-ewendering-the-the-took-tools-tools-tools-to-to-outsmart-hiv.asmart-hiv.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=29438043-9AC4-404C-A5C3-2B76AC403750 Wed, 12 Mar 2025 08:02:00 -0400 Gilead’s capsid revolution meets our capsid solutions: Sino Biological – Engineering the tools to outsmart HIV

大量月经出血可能会导致中年妇女的疲劳多种更年期症状会使女性感到疲劳。热闪烁，睡眠问题，疼痛和抑郁症只是少数。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/heavy-menstrual-bleeding-may-contribute-to-fatigue-fatigue-in-ridlife-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/heavy-menstrual-bleeding-may-contribute-to-fatigue-fatigue-in-midlife-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8902aef-1f3c-1f91-A58B-58B-5EE3EF0AC977 Wed, 12 Mar 2025 07:54:47 -0400 Heavy menstrual bleeding may contribute to fatigue in midlife women

乳腺癌的死亡预计到2025年的欧盟和英国将在大多数年龄段下降除80岁以上的欧盟患者外，欧盟和英国的每个年龄段的乳腺癌的死亡率将在2025年下降。在这些老年患者中，该疾病的总体死亡率预计在2025年将上升近10％。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/breast-cancer-deaths-prected-to-fall-fall-in-in-the-the-the-ph--e--e--------------2025-2025-- across-oss-most-age-gage-groups.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/breast-cancer-deaths-prected-to-fall-fall-in-in-the-the-the-the-ph--e--e------------2025------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------》上符合人数https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97c709f9-849b-4ee0-8b7a-0872bed2b0b2 Wed, 12 Mar 2025 07:19:06 -0400 Breast cancer deaths expected to fall in the EU and UK by 2025 across most age groups
被证明有助于肥胖成年人的体重减轻水/水上有氧运动一次或更长时间以上可以减少腰部尺寸并帮助减肥，发现对现有证据的汇总数据分析，发表在《开放访问》杂志BMJ Open中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/aqua-aerobics-proven-to-weight-weight-weight-weight-weight-weight-weight-weight-loss-in-obese-aidults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/aqua-aerobics-proven-to-weight-weight-weight-weight-weight-weight-weight-loss-in-obese-abeses-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6354b969-1245-4827-b6bb-34dc9adeb8f9 Wed, 12 Mar 2025 06:55:57 -0400 Aqua aerobics proven to aid weight loss in obese adults
Shift Biosciences宣布关键任命，以提高恢复活力治疗管道Shift Biosciences是一家生物技术公司，使用AI动力的虚拟细胞与年龄相关疾病作斗争，今天宣布任命Jill Reckless博士博士，为翻译顾问和劳伦斯·里德（Laurence Reid），博士学位，作为非执行董事。在这些角色中，吉尔（Jill）和劳伦斯（Laurence）将分别指导建立强大的产品翻译和业务开发策略的转变，使公司能够利用早期动力，并发展其新颖的恢复活力疗法迈向临床发展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/shift-biosciences-announce-announces-key-appointments-to-Advance-rejuvenation-therapeutics-therapeutics-pipeline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/shift-biosciences-announces-announces-key-appointments-to-Advance-rejuvance-rejuvenation-therapeutics-pherapeutics-pipeline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dbfcd3da-fd66-4991-bbf4-bf4-bf4-bf4-bf37fb69ec73 Wed, 12 Mar 2025 06:50:00 -0400 Shift Biosciences announces key appointments to advance rejuvenation therapeutics pipeline
